text: 11:2-3 Aposel 10:28; Galesia 2:12Ezɨ Pita uamategha Jerusalemɨn ghuavanabo. Ezɨ gumazir uan mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghoregha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn itiba, me Pitan atara ghaze, “Nɨ arazir manam gamua, egha ghua gumazir uan mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorezir puvatɨzibar dɨpenibar me koma api.”
